description: Unique surrogate identifier for this asset attribute definition; used as the primary key.
Likely code indicating the attribute’s functional category or field type; confirm with SME.
Display label entered by administrators for the attribute as shown in screens and reports.
Longer business description explaining what the attribute captures.
Reference code for the attribute’s data type (e.g., text, number, date) used for validation and storage.
Maximum allowed length or precision for the attribute’s value, depending on its data type.
Flag indicating whether this attribute must have a value for an asset (1 = required, 0 = optional).
Flag marking the attribute as part of the asset’s specification sheet or technical specs; confirm with SME.
Unit associated with the attribute’s numeric values (e.g., volts, amps, liters).
Value automatically populated for the attribute when none is provided.
Sequence number controlling where the attribute appears in user interfaces or printouts.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this attribute record.
Free-text notes or admin comments about the attribute.
Likely timestamp of the last change performed by a user, as opposed to system processes; confirm with SME.
User identifier of the person or process that created this attribute record.
Timestamp when this attribute record was created.
User identifier of the person or process that last updated this attribute record.
Timestamp when this attribute record was last updated.
